bill.title: Relating to military pay; prescribing an effective date.
bill.description: Exempts from state income tax military pay received by Oregon National Guard member while in active service of state or on state active duty. Exempts from state income tax military pay received by Oregon National Guard member while in active service of state or on state active duty. Applies to tax years beginning on or after January 1, 2020. Takes effect on 91st day following adjournment sine die.
